name: A Hitch in Time
description:
A time travelling 70’s office escape room.

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 using the theme 'Joined Together'.

The idea behind the game is that the environment is joined by two different time periods, present day and the past, to solve the puzzles and open the safe in the room.

Controls:

  • Left Click - Interact
  • Right Click - Pick Up
  • E - Hints
  • Control - Crouch

Team (No Fun Allowed):

  • Reuben Parsons - Coding
  • Jon Salter (Puppetsquid) - Coding and Animation
  • Stewart Rollings (ToiL) - Environment and Layout Artist
  • Rachel Gandey-Johnson (Tolonar) - 3D Props Artist
  • David Mohammadi (Cinnaxus) - Sound Design
  • Adele Atchison - 2D Art
  • Dave Gandey - Organisation and Morale

Additional assets used:

  • Wrench from Turbosquid (Bessm)
  • 1971 Saigon Office from Cubebrush.co (Clinton Crumpler)
